biotools.summary: Realigner for next generation sequencing data. It uses localized assembly and global realignment to align reads more accurately, thus improving downstream analysis (detection of indels and complex variants in particular).

bioschemas.name: ABRA
bioschemas.summary: Realigner for next generation sequencing data. It uses localized assembly and global realignment to align reads more accurately, thus improving downstream analysis (detection of indels and complex variants in particular).
